Description:
Rule to detect an adversary setting OabVirtualDirectory External URL property to a script in Exchange Management log

Author: Jose Rodriguez @Cyb3rPandaH
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Exchange Set OabVirtualDirectory ExternalUrl Property
Query: sourcetype='windows-msexchange-management' eql select * from _source_ where ( = 'set-oabvirtualdirectory' and  = 'externalurl' and  = 'page_load' and  = 'script')
